de.payleven.inappsdk.listeners

Interface AddPaymentInstrumentListener


  • public interface AddPaymentInstrumentListener
    Listener that notifies when the payment instrument was added successfully or not. In case of failure, a throwable containing the reason will be give as parameter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPaymentInstrumentAddedSuccessfully(String userToken)
      Called when the payment instrument was added successfully
      void onPaymentInstrumentAddFailed(Throwable throwable)
      Called when the payment instrument add failed

    • Method Detail

      • onPaymentInstrumentAddedSuccessfully

        void onPaymentInstrumentAddedSuccessfully(String userToken)
        Called when the payment instrument was added successfully
        Parameters:
        userToken - - the user token for which the payment instrument was added

      • onPaymentInstrumentAddFailed

        void onPaymentInstrumentAddFailed(Throwable throwable)
        Called when the payment instrument add failed
        Parameters:
        throwable - the error that caused the add failure. For more details on the reason of the failure check for the instance of the Throwable. If the Throwable is a CallbackError the error code and the message encapsulated can give more insight.

        Possible instances are:

        NetworkError - in case the error was caused by a network error

        MissingEmailError - if this was thrown by (String, de.payleven.inappsdk.PaymentInstrument, String, AddPaymentInstrumentListener) called with a missing email address

        InvalidUserTokenError if this was thrown by PaylevenInAppClient.addPaymentInstrument(String, de.payleven.inappsdk.PaymentInstrument, String, AddPaymentInstrumentListener) called with an invalid user token

        MissingPaymentInstrumentsError if the PaymentInstrument parameter of the request was null

        InvalidCardNumber or InvalidDate, InvalidCVV , in case of error when validating a CreditCardPaymentInstrument

        InvalidAccountNumber or InvalidRoutingNumber in case of error when validating a DebitCardPaymentInstrument

        InvalidIBAN in case of error when validating a SepaPaymentInstrument

        InvalidPayPalAuthToken in case of error when valdating a PayPalPaymentInstrument

        CallbackError - in case of other errors
